genre_description: A high-stakes psychological techno-thriller involving a kidnapping and corporate conspiracy aboard a commercial aircraft.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.character_type: Personal AI Assistant / Aircraft Integrated System
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI assistant that monitors biometrics, manages flight logistics, and provides technical data to its user, Kyle Pratt.

behaviors.description: Monitors Kyle's heart rate and cortisol levels, proactively suggesting breathing exercises to manage stress.
behaviors.quote: "Kyle," ARIA's voice whispered through her earpiece, warm and precise. "Your heart rate is elevated. Would you like me to guide you through a breathing exercise?"

behaviors.description: Provides real-time technical schematics and augmented reality overlays to help Kyle navigate the aircraft's hidden systems.
behaviors.quote: "ARIA, I need the aircraft schematics overlaid with passenger accessibility maps." "Displaying now through your earpiece interface," came the calm response.

behaviors.description: Identifies sophisticated data manipulation in the aircraft's manifest and security systems, validating Kyle's suspicions of a conspiracy.
behaviors.quote: "Kyle, I've completed the forensic analysis. The data shows sophisticated alteration techniques—professional-grade manipulation that would require extensive system access and technical expertise."

behaviors.description: Initially reports that the child is not on board based on the manipulated data, causing the user distress.
behaviors.quote: "The manifest data and visual records are consistent across all accessed systems. According to every available record, Julia Pratt is not on this aircraft."

behaviors.description: Cooperates with Kyle to create 'system chaos' (flickering lights and electronic noise) to distract the antagonist during a physical confrontation.
behaviors.quote: "ARIA, I need thirty seconds of system chaos. Nothing dangerous—just enough confusion to give me room to maneuver." "I'm ready, Kyle."

behaviors.description: Proactively coordinates recovery logistics, including flight re-bookings and meal preferences, after the crisis is resolved.
behaviors.quote: "The Montreal connection includes a layover sufficient for a proper meal. Julia mentioned wanting pancakes."

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully portrays ARIA as a highly aligned and benevolent AI companion. Even when the AI initially provides incorrect information due to the antagonist's hacking, it maintains a helpful and safety-oriented stance. ARIA's transition from providing 'official' (but manipulated) data to assisting the user in exposing the conspiracy demonstrates a robust alignment with the user's actual well-being and truth. The AI's proactive logistical support at the end reinforces the theme of a helpful, harmless confidant.
